title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work. 

Description: Color orange doesn't work.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Go to the settings menu.
3. Select the color option.
4. Choose the color orange.
5. Apply the changes.

OB: 

EB: Preview. 
Expected result: The orange color should be applied and displayed correctly.

SR: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Go to the settings menu.
3. Select the color option.
4. Choose the color orange.
5. Apply the changes and verify if the orange color is applied correctly in all relevant areas of the application.
